shorts.content: A designer purse silent auction and raffle was held at Cooper's Seafood House. The silent auction helps support United Cerebral Palsy of Northeastern Pennsylvania.

shorts.title: Gaming for a cause at the 5th annual Extra Life charity event in Scranton
shorts.title_distilled: Gaming for a cause at the 5th annual Extra Life charity event in Scranton.
shorts.description: The money raised by the esports players and community members at the event directly benefits children at the Geisinger Janet Weis Children's Hospital near Danville.
shorts.content: The money raised by the esports players and community members at the event directly benefits children at the Geisinger Janet Weis Children's Hospital near Danville.

shorts.title: Blow mold auction attracts hundreds of bidders to Lackawanna County
shorts.title_distilled: Blow mold auction attracts hundreds of bidders to Lackawanna County.
shorts.description: SPRING BROOK TOWNSHIP, LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — The changing weather on the way may have you thinking about decorating for Christmas. 28/22 News found lots of people on Sunday rearing to get to it. They took part in a unique local auction to fill their yards with some of the biggest and best decorations you [...]
